attributes.action: Support the Sunday Express Crusade to get our police back on the beat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Home Office bureaucracy means police are spending too much time doing paperwork - and not enough time out on the streets catching criminals.
The thin blue line has been stretched to breaking point, leaving towns and cities without enough protection from rising crime.
We call on the Government and Home Secretary John Reid to cut the red tape, end the political correctness and draw up a new Police Charter to let the police do their job and make Britain's streets safe again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
